actionConfiguration.body: SELECT *,CASE WHEN location_granularity='Blanks' OR location_granularity IS NULL THEN 'Non-Location Specific' ELSE 'Location Specific' END "is_location_specific", TO_CHAR(created_on, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS formatted_created_on FROM hubviews.vw_grievancedataset WHERE "ClientKey" = {{appsmith.URL.queryParams.client_key}};
